Entries.DisplayPattern: What's his problem?

Entries.DisplayPattern: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Maru's cute little snowman goes unharmed!

Entries.DialogueText: Ridiculous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ridiculous.

Entries.DisplayPattern: In a couple days I'm going to be living on a . I can't believe it.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy, though. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy, though.

Entries.DisplayPattern: When you showed up in town, I never thought I'd be marrying you some day.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Life is strange, huh?

Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still love me?

Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy with me?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?

Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you want? You sound like my step-dad. Go away.

Entries.DisplayPattern: This is starting to feel like a tomb.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I started smoking again... I've just been really stressed out lately.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could've done better. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could've done better.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited for the Spirit's Eve tomorrow. I wonder what horrors we'll find there.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.

Entries.DisplayPattern: My mother used to always make this delicious pumpkin soup in the fall.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to take a walk today. I need some to myself. I'll see you in the evening.

Entries.DisplayPattern: My day was fine, nothing much to tell you about. Why don't you tell me about yours?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Look at me. Never forget that I love you... you're everything to me.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Now go make us some money.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... come here. You look great today.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You always look great, even after slopping around in the yard all day.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your husband. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your hus. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You don't ever have to worry about me. I like to spend a lot of alone.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes I feel so angry... but when you show up I always start to calm down.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'll mellow out with age.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'll mellow out with age.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I know you're tough, but I still worry about you, somes. Don't ever go monster hunting without a life elixir and some sturdy boots, okay?

Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'm not like most people.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'm not like most people.

Entries.DisplayPattern: The older I get, the less I'm drawn to the city. It had a certain mystique to it, once. But it turns out that was just a romantic fantasy.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I needed some... woke up early from a nightmare and I just couldn't fall back asleep.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I couldn't sleep last night so I went for a night ride on the motorcycle.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Living here with you is teaching me to come out of my shell a little bit. I think it's good for me.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, this sure beats my old basement room, doesn't it?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I drank too much coffee... I don't feel very tired.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm still trying to ust to the schedule. I used to stay up until 5am and sleep in until 2pm, somes.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sure Maru's happy that I'm gone.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I often felt unappreciated back home... but here I feel like I really belong. Thanks for making me feel welcome, .

Entries.DisplayPattern: He does look pretty tough. But still, If I find another injured frog, I think he'd be better off with a friend.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... Well, I like going out in the rain. So I guess I encountered a lot of frogs that way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... Well, I like going out in the rain. So I guess I encountered a lot of frogs that way.

Entries.DialogueText: I ended up feeling a common bond with the little guys.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I ended up feeling a common bond with the little guys.

Entries.DialogueText: Well it's not up for debate. This is my corner of the house and I can do what I want with it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well it's not up for debate. This is my corner of the house and I can do what I want with it.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah, it'll be fun. I spend a lot of time on the computer, so it's nice to have some real, physical hobbies.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah, it'll be fun. I spend a lot of on the computer, so it's nice to have some real, physical hobbies.

Entries.DialogueText: I might even try my hand at some frog breeding! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I might even try my hand at some frog breeding!

Entries.DialogueText: Today our family grew a little larger...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Today our family grew a little larger...

Entries.DialogueText: ...and a lot slimier!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and a lot slimier!

Entries.DialogueText: ...Okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Well? What do you have to say for yourself? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well? What do you have to say for yourself?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry... what I did was wrong.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry... what I did was wrong.

Entries.DialogueText: Guys, calm down! I can explain...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Guys, calm down! I can explain...

Entries.DialogueText: Absolutely. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Absolutely.

Entries.DialogueText: You need to take responsibility for what you've done... {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You need to take responsibility for what you've done...

Entries.DialogueText: Absolutely. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Absolutely.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}?
Hey. I'm surprised to find you out here in the rain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I'm surprised to find you out here in the rain.

Entries.DialogueText: Look at those dark clouds looming over the horizon...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Look at those dark clouds looming over the horizon...

Entries.DialogueText: I hope they come this way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope they come this way.

Entries.DialogueText: I like this weather because it makes everyone disappear... you know?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like this weather because it makes everyone disappear... you know?

Entries.DialogueText: Being around people makes me feel anxious. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Being around people makes me feel anxious.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't feel that way around you, though. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't feel that way around you, though.

Entries.DialogueText: We're getting soaked...
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're getting soaked...

Entries.DialogueText: Here... There's room for two. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here... There's room for two.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hello {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hello .

Entries.DialogueText: What, you haven't seen my motorcycle before? Hmmm... I guess I haven't shown it to you. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What, you haven't seen my motorcycle before? Hmmm... I guess I haven't shown it to you.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes, after sundown, I make the long ride out of Stardew Valley... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes, after sundown, I make the long ride out of Stardew Valley...

Entries.DialogueText: There's nothing else like it, blazing along the empty stretch of road toward the faint city glow... {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's nothing else like it, blazing along the empty stretch of road toward the faint city glow...

Entries.DialogueText: Once I've saved up enough money, I'm going to head out on my own... to the city and beyond. Just me and my bike. {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Once I've saved up enough money, I'm going to head out on my own... to the city and beyond. Just me and my bike.

Entries.DialogueText: There we go, oil's changed. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There we go, oil's changed.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... Maybe I'll let you ride sometime, if you want. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... Maybe I'll let you ride some, if you want.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... maybe I'll take you for a ride some day. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... maybe I'll take you for a ride some day.

Entries.DialogueText: That sounds fun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That sounds fun.

Entries.DialogueText: No thanks. That sounds stupid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No thanks. That sounds stupid.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm scared of motorcycles.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm scared of motorcycles.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}. I was just about to head out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey . I was just about to head out.

Entries.DialogueText: Hop on...I wanna show you something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hop on...I wanna show you something.

Entries.DialogueText: That's Zuzu City in the distance...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's Zuzu City in the distance...

Entries.DialogueText: I come here when I want to get away from everything and just... think.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I come here when I want to get away from everything and just... think.

Entries.DialogueText: So, what do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, what do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: It's beautiful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's beautiful.

Entries.DialogueText: It gives me a strange, sad feeling.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It gives me a strange, sad feeling.

Entries.DialogueText: Kind of ugly.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kind of ugly.

Entries.DialogueText: You should quit smoking.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should quit smoking.

Entries.DialogueText: The city used to draw me in... but now I'm finding myself happier at home in the valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The city used to draw me in... but now I'm finding myself happier at home in the valley.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}...? {Portrait:Sad}
Um... I've never... felt anything like this with another guy before... But you're different. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... I've never... felt anything like this with another guy before... But you're different.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't usually bring girls to this place... In fact, you're the only one. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't usually bring girls to this ... In fact, you're the only one.

Entries.DialogueText: You know what I'm trying to say, don't you? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know what I'm trying to say, don't you?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}... Glad you showed up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey ... Glad you showed up.

Entries.DialogueText: There's an injured frog in that bush... I gotta save him!
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's an injured frog in that bush... I gotta save him!

Entries.DialogueText: I need your help. Go over to the bush and try to get him to come towards me. I'll wait over here and catch him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need your help. Go over to the bush and try to get him to come towards me. I'll wait over here and catch him.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay... you ready?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay... you ready?

Entries.DialogueText: Now!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now!

Entries.DialogueText: Got him!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Got him!

Entries.DialogueText: Poor little guy... his foot's all mangled. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Poor little guy... his foot's all mangled.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna take him home for now, and make him comfortable.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna take him home for now, and make him comfortable.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'll do some research on how to take care of frogs. Maybe Marnie knows something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'll do some research on how to take care of frogs. Maybe Marnie knows something.

Entries.DialogueText: Hah... Yeah, I guess so. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah... Yeah, I guess so.

Entries.DialogueText: He's definitely got your nose... {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's definitely got your nose...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, sorry if I don't take your word for it... I'm gonna give the poor guy a chance.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, sorry if I don't take your word for it... I'm gonna give the poor guy a chance.

Entries.DialogueText: We'll do our best. But don't get too attached just yet...
Entries.DisplayPattern: We'll do our best. But don't get too attached just yet...

Entries.DialogueText: Let's take him home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's take him home.

Entries.DialogueText: Yea
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yea

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hey. Gimme one sec.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hey. Gimme one sec.

Entries.DialogueText: He's busy... I should leave.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's busy... I should leave.

Entries.DialogueText: Stay put.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stay put.

Entries.DialogueText: Where are you going? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where are you going?

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry... I had to finish this line before I lost my train of thought.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry... I had to finish this line before I lost my train of thought.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay. Sorry about that, I just needed to finish what I was working on.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay. Sorry about that, I just needed to finish what I was working on.

Entries.DialogueText: I do freelance work as a programmer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I do freelance work as a programmer.

Entries.DialogueText: Decorations?... Oh, yeah... thanks. I've been sticking posters on the wall for years, I guess it's kinda cluttered.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Decorations?... Oh, yeah... thanks. I've been sticking posters on the wall for years, I guess it's kinda cluttered.

Entries.DialogueText: That was an instant message from Sam... I guess he wants to hang out...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was an instant message from Sam... I guess he wants to hang out...

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh, I don't really feel like going out today. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh, I don't really feel like going out today.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you tell her I'm working?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you tell her I'm working?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... No one takes my job seriously. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... No one takes my job seriously.

Entries.DialogueText: No one ever bothers Maru when she's working at the clinic... does everyone think I'm just surfing the web all day?
Entries.DisplayPattern: No one ever bothers Maru when she's working at the clinic... does everyone think I'm just surfing the web all day?

Entries.DialogueText: Ask him about his career goals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ask him about his career goals.

Entries.DialogueText: Ask him why he doesn't want to see his friends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ask him why he doesn't want to see his friends.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'm trying to save up so I can move out of here. Probably to the city or something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'm trying to save up so I can move out of here. Probably to the city or something.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, if I'd gone to college I'd probably be making six figures right now... but I just don't want to be part of that corporate rat race, you know?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, if I'd gone to college I'd probably be making six figures right now... but I just don't want to be part of that corporate rat race, you know?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, and I guess I just feel more comfortable hidden behind the computer than dealing with people face-to-face. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, and I guess I just feel more comfortable hidden behind the computer than dealing with people face-to-face.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I like having friends, I just need a lot of time alone to balance out the social stuff. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I like having friends, I just need a lot of alone to balance out the social stuff.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam's the opposite... he goes crazy if he's alone for too long.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam's the opposite... he goes crazy if he's alone for too long.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe that's why I like computers so much... They're engaging, straightforward, and unselfish. Quite the opposite of a lot of people I know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe that's why I like computers so much... They're engaging, straightforward, and unselfish. Quite the opposite of a lot of people I know.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, .

Entries.DialogueText: Sam and I were about to play 'Solarion Chronicles: The Game'... Why don't you join us? It's better with three players anyway. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam and I were about to play 'Solarion Chronicles: The Game'... Why don't you join us? It's better with three players anyway.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, here we go... Let me draw the scenario card. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, here we go... Let me draw the scenario card.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... It looks like today's quest will take us into the Necromancer's Tower... to try and reclaim the Solarion Staff from the clutches of Dreadlord Xarth.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... It looks like today's quest will take us into the Necromancer's Tower... to try and reclaim the Solarion Staff from the clutches of Dreadlord Xarth.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! That's what I was going to pick! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! That's what I was going to pick!

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'll be the healer then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'll be the healer then.

Entries.DialogueText: Good choice. Warrior's probably the easiest for beginners. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good choice. Warrior's probably the easiest for beginners.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'll pick the wizard, then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'll pick the wizard, then.

Entries.DialogueText: Healer, huh? That's a very important role. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Healer, huh? That's a very important role.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'll pick the wizard, then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'll pick the wizard, then.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's begin...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's begin...

Entries.DialogueText: The King has entrusted you and your companions with recovering the Solarion Staff... a task which, if completed successfully, will ensure your place in the hall of legends as well as a sizable fortune of gold and silver.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The King has entrusted you and your companions with recovering the Solarion Staff... a task which, if completed successfully, will ensure your in the hall of legends as well as a sizable fortune of gold and silver.

Entries.DialogueText: After a long month journeying across unforgiving lands, you step out onto a precipice to see your destination looming in the distance.
Entries.DisplayPattern: After a long month journeying across unforgiving lands, you step out onto a precipice to see your destination looming in the distance.

Entries.DialogueText: There, beyond a moonlit plain, lies the Necromancer's Tower... where Dreadlord Xarth usurps the power of the stolen Solarion Staff for his vile purposes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There, beyond a moonlit plain, lies the Necromancer's Tower... where Dreadlord Xarth usurps the power of the stolen Solarion Staff for his vile purposes.

Entries.DialogueText: The tower lies before you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The tower lies before you.

Entries.DialogueText: Go in the front. Fortune favors the bold.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Go in the front. Fortune favors the bold.

Entries.DialogueText: Search for a back entrance. Let's remain hidden.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Search for a back entrance. Let's remain hidden.

Entries.DialogueText: A skeleton guards the hallway before you. It looks dangerous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A skeleton guards the hallway before you. It looks dangerous.

Entries.DialogueText: What do you do?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you do?

Entries.DialogueText: Fight the skeleton.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fight the skeleton.

Entries.DialogueText: Run away.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Run away.

Entries.DialogueText: The skeleton lunges forward!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The skeleton lunges forward!

Entries.DialogueText: Swing your weapons.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Swing your weapons.

Entries.DialogueText: Raise your shields.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Raise your shields.

Entries.DialogueText: You successfully block the attack. The skeleton stumbles backward, giving you enough time to strike out and slay the foul creature.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You successfully block the attack. The skeleton stumbles backward, giving you enough to strike out and slay the foul creature.

Entries.DialogueText: You continue down the hallway, taking care not to step on the skeleton's remains.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You continue down the hallway, taking care not to step on the skeleton's remains.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, .

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
Sam charges ahead and strikes down Xarth, freeing the Solarion Staff from his clutches and restoring peace and order to the world.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam charges ahead and strikes down Xarth, freeing the Solarion Staff from his clutches and restoring peace and order to the world.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, not bad! {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, not bad!

Entries.DialogueText: It took me like, three or four tries to beat my first scenario. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It took me like, three or four tries to beat my first scenario.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for stopping by... I'll see you later. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for stopping by... I'll see you later.

Entries.DialogueText: It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.

Entries.DialogueText: That lady told me my fortune. I don't know what to make of it... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That lady told me my fortune. I don't know what to make of it...

Entries.DialogueText: That lady in the graveyard predicted our future... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That lady in the graveyard predicted our future...

Entries.DialogueText: Apparently, we're destined to live a happy life together. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Apparently, we're destined to live a happy life together.

Entries.DialogueText: I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.

Entries.DialogueText: It's pretty cool though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's pretty cool though.

Entries.DialogueText: It would be interesting to have one of these on the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It would be interesting to have one of these on the .

Entries.DialogueText: This is my spot. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is my spot.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, could you... give me a hand? Hehehe... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, could you... give me a hand? Hehehe...

Entries.DialogueText: These gravestones would look nice on the farm, don't you think? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: These gravestones would look nice on the , don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: We used to do a rotten egg toss...
Entries.DisplayPattern: We used to do a rotten egg toss...

Entries.DialogueText: Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt.

Entries.DialogueText: You know what? I kind of miss the winter... it's simpler, in a way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know what? I kind of miss the winter... it's simpler, in a way.

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh...

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't come here by choice. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't come here by choice.

Entries.DialogueText: You're the only reason I came all the way out here... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're the only reason I came all the way out here...

Entries.DialogueText: One year Sam put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One year Sam put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.

Entries.DialogueText: Ever wondered why Sam leads the town in community service hours? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ever wondered why Sam leads the town in community service hours?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm doing my best to stay in a good mood...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm doing my best to stay in a good mood...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hey. Looking to escape the noise too? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hey. Looking to escape the noise too?

Entries.DialogueText: Do you remember when you caught me in this spot on that rainy day? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you remember when you caught me in this spot on that rainy day?

Entries.DialogueText: Even though this is my solo spot... I was really glad you came. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even though this is my solo spot... I was really glad you came.

Entries.DialogueText: I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.

Entries.DialogueText: Just trying to scare you... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just trying to scare you...

Entries.DialogueText: When you stare into the ocean, there's a chance something down there is looking back at you... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you stare into the ocean, there's a chance something down there is looking back at you...

Entries.DialogueText: I remember the first Moonlight Jellies festival that you came to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember the first Moonlight Jellies festival that you came to.

Entries.DialogueText: You didn't notice, but I was watching you when the jellies came up. You looked beautiful in that blue light... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You didn't notice, but I was watching you when the jellies came up. You looked beautiful in that blue light...

Entries.DialogueText: Spending time with family is tiring sometimes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Spending with family is tiring somes.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. As you can see, I'm fulfilling my family obligations...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . As you can see, I'm fulfilling my family obligations...

Entries.DialogueText: I guess it's nice the whole family is together for once. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess it's nice the whole family is together for once.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... don't worry, you don't need to get me anything. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... don't worry, you don't need to get me anything.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just happy to wake up next to you every morning... what else could a guy ask for? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just happy to wake up next to you every morning... what else could a guy ask for?

Entries.DialogueText: Cold? Nah, I never get cold.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cold? Nah, I never get cold.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me, I never get cold...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me, I never get cold...

Entries.DialogueText: You ever notice how quiet it is in the snow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You ever notice how quiet it is in the snow?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you really need to win the contest today. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you really need to win the contest today.

Entries.DialogueText: Uh... well, I guess I made a little bet with Marlon... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uh... well, I guess I made a little bet with Marlon...

Entries.DialogueText: I really love this. How did you know?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really love this. How did you know?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, I like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, I like this.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I hate this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I hate this.

Entries.DialogueText: ...thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: Before I met you, I spent most of my time turned away from reality... because I thought I'd never find happiness.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Before I met you, I spent most of my turned away from reality... because I thought I'd never find happiness.

Entries.DialogueText: ...but you've shown me that the world isn't such a dark place, after all. {Portrait:Happy}"/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "...That's one of the reasons I love you..."
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...but you've shown me that the world isn't such a dark , after all."/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "...That's one of the reasons I love you..."

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. I heard this movie is pretty grim... I'm looking forward to it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I heard this movie is pretty grim... I'm looking forward to it.

Entries.DialogueText: This cinematography is next-level.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This cinematography is next-level.

Entries.DialogueText: Sebastian has a grin on his face.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sebastian has a grin on his face.

Entries.DialogueText: Best movie I've seen in a while... I wonder how they did some of those special effects? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Best movie I've seen in a while... I wonder how they did some of those special effects?

Entries.DialogueText: *shrugs*... The movie poster looked pretty cool, so I'm in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *shrugs*... The movie poster looked pretty cool, so I'm in.

Entries.DialogueText: It wasn't the best ever, but I had a pretty good time... thanks for inviting me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It wasn't the best ever, but I had a pretty good ... thanks for inviting me.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope it's short...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope it's short...

Entries.DialogueText: It's probably a fine movie for the target audience, but it's just not for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's probably a fine movie for the target audience, but it's just not for me.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I'll just stay here and relax in the shade.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I'll just stay here and relax in the shade.

Entries.DialogueText: You know how I am... I've always been more of a cave dweller. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know how I am... I've always been more of a cave dweller.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. I'm just hanging out with this bird. She seems to like me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I'm just hanging out with this bird. She seems to like me.

Entries.DialogueText: I found some stuff by the lake.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found some stuff by the lake.
